casebody.data:
ELLIOTT, et al.
v.
COUNTY OF HALIFAX. No. 590P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2005. John W. O'Tuel, III, Raleigh, for The County of Halifax. Janet Dudley, Bradley A. Elliott, Roanoke Rpds., for Elliott, et al. James B. Blackburn, Raleigh, for Asso. of County Commissioners.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of March 2005 by Defendant for Consolidation:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2005."
